text:
I am unable to run the Xang sample programs (hello.xap).  Tomcat seems to be 
loading the servlet.

Exception report

message Internal Server Error

description The server encountered an internal error (Internal Server Error) 
that prevented it from fulfilling this request.

creator: pramod@indent.org
mrglavas@ca.ibm.com
text:
Ancient bug report against Xang. Not an XML Commons issue.

Note that Xang was retired to the Apache Attic in December 2009 so unlikely any problems with it will ever be fixed.
